title: Honda announces new engine assembly line at its Global Resource Factory in Haryana
description: Honda Motorcycle & Scooter India unveiled a new engine line in Haryana for CKD exports, emphasizing innovation and efficiency. The assembly line, capable of producing 600 engines daily, caters to diverse customer needs and plays a vital role in the company's global expansion.
